message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose an offer of $7,500.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're working with a limited budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $8,500. This is a fair price considering the value the product brings to your business.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose an offer of $8,200.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go below $9,000. I'm willing to make another concession and offer it to you for $8,800. This is the lowest I can go without compromising the value of the product.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to accommodate my budget constraints. I would like to propose an offer of $8,600.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go below $9,500. I'm willing to make another concession and offer it to you for $9,200. This is the lowest I can go without compromising the value of the product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I've carefully considered our previous discussions and am prepared to offer $8,700 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go below $9,000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $9,000. This is the final offer I can make.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I would like to make a final counteroffer of $8,500 for the product.
